column4: drdobb, I have noticed that mine tends to slow down if I have the nautilus open to the flash drive while copying. Try closing the nautilus window while copying it might help.. but you may have a problem with your Usb Connection. try using a diufferent port?
I tried the obvious stuff - using another port, running dosfsck on the flash stick, even reformatting it
I have no nautilus windows open now, and copying to the flash stick is sloooow
actually I'm now using rsync to copy files and not nautilus, but that didn't help much either
